response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. This product, tailored specifically to your needs and desires, is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price, reflecting my desire to ensure that this valuable asset finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates it as much as we do.

Considering its significance to both of us, I propose a price of $1,200,000 for the product. This offer represents a significant discount from its true value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to secure it at a price that is still highly advantageous to me while ensuring you receive a great deal.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will bring you immense satisfaction and fulfillment, and I am eager to facilitate this transaction.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
